params.param:
select count(sd.r_object_id) as cnt from eifx_deliverable_doc sd, dm_relation rel, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_ant, eifx_deliverable_doc rd, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_od, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_prev_rev where sd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Cost Estimate Document','Cost Estimate Document P1') and rd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rel.parent_id = rd_prev_rev.r_object_id and rel.child_id = sd.r_object_id and rd_od.eif_type_of_doc like 'OD%' and rd_od.eif_revision = (select max(tq2.tq_doc_revision) from eifx_deliverable_doc tq2 where tq2.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Technical Query', 'Technical Query P0','Technical Query P1') and rd.sib_set_type_rus = tq2.sib_set_type_rus and rd.sib_unit_title = tq2.sib_unit_title and rd.eif_originator = tq2.eif_originator and tq2.tq_introduction_changes = 'С внесением изменений в РД и сметы' and tq2.tq_review_result = 'С изменением РД') and rd.sib_set_type_rus = sd.sib_set_type_rus and rd.sib_unit_title = sd.sib_unit_title
and sd.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and sd.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title
and rd_prev_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_ant.i_chronicle_id and rd_prev_rev.eif_revision = rd_ant.eif_revision and rd_prev_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_prev_rev.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_prev_rev.eif_originator = rd.eif_originator and rd_od.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_od.eif_originator = rd.eif_originator and rd_ant.r_object_id = rd.i_antecedent_id and rd.r_object_id='${this.r_object_id}'

select distinct sd.r_object_id from eifx_deliverable_doc sd, dm_relation rel, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_ant, eifx_deliverable_doc rd, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_od, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_prev_rev where sd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Cost Estimate Document','Cost Estimate Document P1') and rd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rel.parent_id = rd_prev_rev.r_object_id and rel.child_id = sd.r_object_id and rd_od.eif_type_of_doc like 'OD%' and rd_od.eif_revision = (select max(tq2.tq_doc_revision) from eifx_deliverable_doc tq2 where tq2.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Technical Query', 'Technical Query P0','Technical Query P1') and rd.sib_set_type_rus = tq2.sib_set_type_rus and rd.sib_unit_title = tq2.sib_unit_title and rd.eif_originator = tq2.eif_originator and tq2.tq_introduction_changes = 'С внесением изменений в РД и сметы' and tq2.tq_review_result = 'С изменением РД') and rd.sib_set_type_rus = sd.sib_set_type_rus and rd.sib_unit_title = sd.sib_unit_title
and sd.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and sd.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title
and rd_prev_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_ant.i_chronicle_id and rd_prev_rev.eif_revision = rd_ant.eif_revision and rd_prev_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_prev_rev.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_prev_rev.eif_originator = rd.eif_originator and rd_od.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_od.eif_originator = rd.eif_originator and rd_ant.r_object_id = rd.i_antecedent_id and rd.r_object_id='${this.r_object_id}'

select sd.r_object_id as sd_object_id, rd_od.r_object_id as rd_object_id, rd_od.eif_revision, '${this.r_object_id}' as tq_object_id, '${this.tq_doc_revision}' as tq_doc_revision from eifx_deliverable_doc sd, dm_relation rel, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_od, eifx_deliverable_doc rd, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_cur_rev where sd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Cost Estimate Document','Cost Estimate Document P1') and rd_cur_rev.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rel.parent_id = rd_cur_rev.r_object_id and rel.child_id = sd.r_object_id and rd_od.eif_type_of_doc like 'OD%'
and rd_od.sib_unit_title = '${this.sib_unit_title}' and rd_od.sib_set_type_rus = '${this.sib_set_type_rus}' and rd_od.eif_originator = '${this.eif_originator}' and '${this.tq_introduction_changes}' = 'С внесением изменений в РД и сметы' and '${this.tq_review_result}' = 'С изменением РД' and '${this.ecs_lc_state}' in ('Finished')
and sd.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od.sib_set_type_rus and sd.sib_unit_title = rd_od.sib_unit_title
and rd.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od.sib_set_type_rus and rd.sib_unit_title = rd_od.sib_unit_title
and rd_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd.i_chronicle_id and rd_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd.eif_revision and rd_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title

params.param:
select distinct sd.r_object_id as sd_object_id, rd_od.r_object_id as rd_object_id, rd_od.eif_revision, tq.r_object_id as tq_object_id, tq.tq_doc_revision from eifx_deliverable_doc sd, dm_relation rel, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_od, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_od_prev_rev, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_od_prev_rev_all, eifx_deliverable_doc tq, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_all, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_all_cur_rev where sd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Cost Estimate Document','Cost Estimate Document P1') and rd_od.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od_prev_rev.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_all_cur_rev.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od_prev_rev_all.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and tq.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Technical Query', 'Technical Query P0','Technical Query P1') and (rel.parent_id = rd_all_cur_rev.r_object_id or rel.parent_id = rd_od_prev_rev_all.r_object_id) and rel.child_id = sd.r_object_id
and rd_od.eif_type_of_doc like 'OD%' and rd_od.sib_unit_title = tq.sib_unit_title and rd_od.sib_set_type_rus = tq.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od.eif_originator = tq.eif_originator and tq.tq_introduction_changes = 'С внесением изменений в РД и сметы' and tq.tq_review_result = 'С изменением РД' and tq.ecs_lc_state in ('Finished') and sd.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od.sib_set_type_rus and sd.sib_unit_title = rd_od.sib_unit_title and rd_all.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od.sib_set_type_rus and rd_all.sib_unit_title = rd_od.sib_unit_title and rd_od_prev_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_od_prev_rev_all.i_chronicle_id and rd_od_prev_rev.eif_revision = rd_od_prev_rev_all.eif_revision and rd_od_prev_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od_prev_rev_all.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od_prev_rev.sib_unit_title = rd_od_prev_rev_all.sib_unit_title
and rd_all_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_all.i_chronicle_id and rd_all_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd_all.eif_revision and rd_all_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd_all.sib_set_type_rus and rd_all_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd_all.sib_unit_title and rd_od_prev_rev.r_object_id = rd_od.i_antecedent_id
and rd_od.r_object_id='${this.r_object_id}'

params.param:
select distinct sd.r_object_id as sd_object_id, rd_od.r_object_id as rd_object_id, rd_od.eif_revision, tq.r_object_id as tq_object_id, tq.tq_doc_revision from eifx_deliverable_doc sd, dm_relation rel, eifx_deliverable_doc rd, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_od, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_od_cur_rev, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_cur_rev, eifx_deliverable_doc tq, eifx_deliverable_doc rd_all, eifx_deliverable_doc (all) rd_all_cur_rev where sd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Cost Estimate Document','Cost Estimate Document P1') and rd.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_cur_rev.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_od_cur_rev.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_all.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and rd_all_cur_rev.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Detailed Design Document','Detailed Design Document P1') and tq.ecs_doc_type_name in ('Technical Query', 'Technical Query P0','Technical Query P1') and rel.parent_id = rd_all_cur_rev.r_object_id and rel.child_id = sd.r_object_id and rd_od.eif_type_of_doc like 'OD%' and rd.sib_set_type_rus = sd.sib_set_type_rus and rd.sib_unit_title = sd.sib_unit_title and rd.sib_unit_title = tq.sib_unit_title and rd.sib_set_type_rus = tq.sib_set_type_rus and rd.eif_originator = tq.eif_originator and tq.tq_introduction_changes = 'С внесением изменений в РД и сметы' and tq.tq_review_result = 'С изменением РД' and tq.ecs_lc_state in ('Finished')
and sd.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and sd.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title
and rd_od.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_all.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_all.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_od_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_od.i_chronicle_id and rd_od_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd_od.eif_revision and rd_od_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd_od.sib_unit_title and rd_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd.i_chronicle_id and rd_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd.eif_revision and rd_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title
and rd_all_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_all.i_chronicle_id and rd_all_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd_all.eif_revision and rd_all_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd_all.sib_set_type_rus and rd_all_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd_all.sib_unit_title and rd.r_object_id='${this.r_object_id}'

and rd_od.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_all.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_all.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title and rd_od_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_od.i_chronicle_id and rd_od_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd_od.eif_revision and rd_od_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd_od.sib_set_type_rus and rd_od_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd_od.sib_unit_title and rd_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd.i_chronicle_id and rd_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd.eif_revision and rd_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd.sib_set_type_rus and rd_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd.sib_unit_title
and rd_all_cur_rev.i_chronicle_id = rd_all.i_chronicle_id and rd_all_cur_rev.eif_revision = rd_all.eif_revision and rd_all_cur_rev.sib_set_type_rus = rd_all.sib_set_type_rus and rd_all_cur_rev.sib_unit_title = rd_all.sib_unit_title and sd.r_object_id='${this.r_object_id}'

task.name: EIF_TR_REV_COMMENT
task.query: select t.r_object_id,t.eif_subject_int_ref,t.eif_owner, datetostring_local(t.eif_date_due, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH:mi:ss') as eif_date_due from eif_task t, eifx_transmittal tr where t.eif_key='${task_type}' and t.eif_pending_flag=0 and t.eif_subject_int_ref = tr.ecs_internal_ref and tr.sib_tr_class_code like '3 - %' order by t.eif_subject_int_ref

task.name: EIF_TR_REV_LEAD
task.query: select t.r_object_id,t.eif_subject_int_ref,t.eif_owner, datetostring_local(t.eif_date_due, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH:mi:ss') as eif_date_due from eif_task t, eifx_transmittal tr where t.eif_key='${task_type}' and t.eif_subject_int_ref = tr.ecs_internal_ref and tr.sib_tr_class_code like '3 - %' order by t.eif_subject_int_ref

task.name: EIF_TR_REV_APPROVER
task.query: select t.r_object_id,t.eif_subject_int_ref,t.eif_owner, datetostring_local(t.eif_date_due, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH:mi:ss') as eif_date_due from eif_task t, eifx_transmittal tr where t.eif_key='${task_type}' and t.eif_pending_flag=0 and t.eif_subject_int_ref = tr.ecs_internal_ref and tr.sib_tr_class_code like '3 - %' order by t.eif_subject_int_ref
